title: Second Term at Trebizon
description: Right from the start of Rebecca Mason's second term at Trebizon School, Tish Anderson behaves most oddly. Why is she suddenly so keen for Sue Murdoch to compete for the Music Scholarship? Then When Sue's secret ambition to become captain of the hockey team looks close to being fulfilled, Tish adamantly opposes her. With her two best friends at loggerheads, Rebecca is caught in a real dilemma.
author: Anne Digby
